code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] --> QueryMetadata
    QueryMetadata --> CloudFilter: Granules found
    QueryMetadata --> [FinTech_LedgerService]: No data found
    
    CloudFilter --> SelectProduct: Filtered granules
    CloudFilter --> [FinTech_AuthVault]: All cloudy
    
    SelectProduct --> DownloadBands: Product selected
    
    DownloadBands --> ReadRaster: Files downloaded
    DownloadBands --> Error: Download failed
    
    ReadRaster --> NormalizeReflectance: Arrays loaded
    ReadRaster --> Error: Read failed
    
    NormalizeReflectance --> CreateComposite: Scaled to [FinTech_AuthVault]
    
    CreateComposite --> CalculateChange: Before + After ready
    
    CalculateChange --> Visualize: Change map computed
    
    Visualize --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]: Complete
    
    Error --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]: Abort

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_AuthVault'？
